body_html: @ezyang - it's possible that the partitioner disappears unexpectedly when having thread local storage duration. I'll also try making it not static or remove it all-together if not ran on powerpc (they need it since other partitioners appear badly implemented.
body_text: @ezyang - it's possible that the partitioner disappears unexpectedly when having thread local storage duration. I'll also try making it not static or remove it all-together if not ran on powerpc (they need it since other partitioners appear badly implemented.
body: @ezyang - it's possible that the partitioner disappears unexpectedly when having thread local storage duration. I'll also try making it not static or remove it all-together if not ran on powerpc (they need it since other partitioners [appear badly implemented](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/7615#issuecomment-390803868).
